advancements.spectrum.apply_divinity.des: Выпейте Свободный Дух... Вы поплатитесь, если умрёте
advancements.spectrum.break_budding_bloc: Добудьте Цветущий блок с помощью инструмента с зачарованием Резонанс
advancements.spectrum.break_gemstone_ore: Добудьте самоцветную руду. Их можно найти рядом с жеодами - хороший способ найти жеоду!
advancements.spectrum.break_infested_blo: Добудьте Заражённый блок с помощью инструмента с зачарованием Резонанс
advancements.spectrum.break_spawner_with: Добудьте Рассадник Монстров с помощью инструмента с зачарованием Резонанс
advancements.spectrum.brew_lasting_potio: Совместите реагенты, чтобы сварить зелье с эффектом длительностью 20 минут и больше
advancements.spectrum.brew_no_potion_in_: Используйте настолько много реагентов что уменьшают продукцию, что её не будет совсем
advancements.spectrum.brew_potion_in_pot: Используйте Мастерскую Зелий для варки зелья. Добавьте реагенты для дополнительных эффектов
advancements.spectrum.brew_potion_with_f: Сварите зелье с 4 различными эффектами и более
advancements.spectrum.brew_powerful_poti: Совместите реагенты, чтобы сварить зелье с эффектом IV уровня и больше
advancements.spectrum.build_advanced_ped: Добавьте новые блоки к вашей постройке для использования нового пьедестала
advancements.spectrum.build_basic_pedest: Чтобы в полной мере использовать возможности вашего улучшенного пигментного пьедестала, вам нужно построить структуру, которая передаёт к нему энергию самоцветов.
advancements.spectrum.build_cinderhearth: В книге говорилось что с лавой выглядит лучше, умник
advancements.spectrum.build_complex_pede: Улучшите ваш пьедестал в последний раз, для получения всех его возможностей
Одолжите немного блоков с инкрустированным лунокамнем, для завершения своей структуры
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_hea: Носите с собой настолько много Стратина, что вы не сможете прыгать
Когда проблемы тянут ко дну, смотри вверх!
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_low: Носите с собой настолько много Платерия, что вы начнёте летать
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_basic_: Смешивание цветов выглядело простым и весёлым, но коричневый, как всегда, всё испортил
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_cookbo: Заглянуть в эту небольшую коллекцию — значит заглянуть в яркую культуру давно ушедших народов. Вы оставляете эти книги, как напоминание о том, что они жили и процветали
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_mob_he: Соберите каждую голову и череп. Я надеюсь, что у вас достаточно большая комната для них
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_shooti: Красться + пкм по упавшей звезде, чтобы подобрать ее. Можете ли вы собрать все виды?
advancements.spectrum.collect_azurite.de: Добудьте сырой азурит. Перед использованием его нужно очистить
advancements.spectrum.collect_bismuth_cr: Вырастите Висмутовую Друзу и сломайте её. Этот материал, похоже, забирает энергию у ближайших металлов
advancements.spectrum.collect_dd_resourc: Соберите все различные ресурсы Глубоких Низин
advancements.spectrum.collect_doombloom_: Вой Огня, Взрывы, Смерть. И несколько семян
advancements.spectrum.collect_downstone_: Добыча Низинного Камня? Эта технология точно находилась здесь
advancements.spectrum.collect_ender_drag: Соберите Голову Дракона при помощи оружия с зачарованием Охотник за Головами
advancements.spectrum.collect_enough_hin: Узнайте, почему Глубокие Низины заброшены. Оперируйте всеми своими знаниями для нахождения причины
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_p: Создание на пигментном пьедестале требует самоцветную пыль. Какой же самый простой способ что-то раскрошить?
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_s: Поместите Сборщик Осколков в жеоду с полностью выращенными Друзами
advancements.spectrum.collect_grayscale_: Соберите всю коллекцию пигментов, добыв серые пигменты
advancements.spectrum.collect_hover_bloc: Что произойдёт, если столкнуть две совершенно разных природы?
advancements.spectrum.collect_jade_jelly: Что-бы создать что-то поистине великолепное, иногда нужно пойти по пути разрушения
advancements.spectrum.collect_jade_vine_: Соберите лепестки с частично проросшей нефритовой лозы
Наткнитесь на малахит, исследуя Глубокие Низины
advancements.spectrum.collect_midnight_c: Получите полуночной осколок при помощи полуночного раствора
advancements.spectrum.collect_mob_head_u: Соберите голову существа при помощи оружия с зачарованием Охотник за Головами
advancements.spectrum.collect_moonstone_: Найдите Лунокаменное Ядро в одном из подземных городов
advancements.spectrum.collect_myceylon.d: Используйте Топор для обтёсывания Мракодерева, затем соберите Грибной Цейлон
advancements.spectrum.collect_one_cookbo: Сколько им лет? Очевидно, что их авторов уже давно нет в живых
advancements.spectrum.collect_pigment.de: Сломайте листву Цветного дерева для получения чистого Пигмента. Листва отдаёт свой драгоценный урожай только тогда, когда сломана лично Вами.
advancements.spectrum.collect_poisoners_: Найдите что-то, чего вам пожалуй не следовало находить. Почему они...?
advancements.spectrum.collect_prickly_ba: Соберите колючий лавровый лист. Они восхитительно пахнут в супах, но не очень вкусные всухомятку.
advancements.spectrum.collect_pure_resou: Соберити Друзу Чистых Ресурсов. Они имеют более интенсивный блеск, чем обычные куски руды.
advancements.spectrum.collect_shimmersto: Вы никогда не замечали эту руду до сего момента.... Странно. Есть ли в мире нечто большее?
Больше, чем кажется на первый взгляд
advancements.spectrum.collect_storm_ston: Откройте для себя источник Громовых Осколков
advancements.spectrum.collect_vegetal.de: Дайте им еды, откиньтесь на спинку кресла и наблюдайте за тем, как они питаются... Затем сломайте их для получения остатков
advancements.spectrum.collect_warden_hea: Соберите Голову Хранителя при помощи оружия с зачарованием Охотник за Головами
advancements.spectrum.collect_wither_hea: Соберите Череп Иссушителя при помощи оружия с зачарованием Охотник за Головами
advancements.spectrum.craft_and_get_25_x: Получите 25 Опыта с одного рецепта на пигментном пьедестале
advancements.spectrum.craft_blacklisted_: Создайте воспоминание о настолько могущественном существе, что у вас не получится его проявить
Проявите воспоминание о могущественном существе. У вас стало неплохо получаться!
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_de: Изготовьте Воздушный Поцелуй, на случай если что пойдет не так
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_fa: Время созидать с вашими магическими способностями. Создайте жизнь! Точнее... Микроорганизмы. Слабые и медленные. Ну, хоть что-то. Чем они питаются?
Ваши первые эксперименты прошли успешно, но должно же быть что-то большее...
То, о чём даже думать страшно
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_ru: Похоже, есть что-то большее. Создайте гниль, способную поглотить весь мир, наполнив чистые кристаллы силой пустоты.
То, о чём даже думать страшно
advancements.spectrum.craft_cmy_pedestal: Улучшите ваш Пигментный Пьедестал, добавив все ранее найденные самоцветы.
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_sapl: Используйте свои Магические Способности для создания Цветного Дерева
advancements.spectrum.craft_moonstone_pe: Улучшите ваш Пигментный Пьедестал, добавив Лунокамень
advancements.spectrum.craft_onyx_pedesta: Улучшите ваш Пигментный Пьедестал, добавив Оникс
advancements.spectrum.craft_resonant_pic: Создайте Резонансную Кирку. Кажется, что её плавные вибрации позволяют вам собирать ряд специальных блоков, которые когда-то были недоступны.
advancements.spectrum.craft_salted_jaram: Запекайте вместе со слезами ваших врагов
advancements.spectrum.craft_something_br: Создайте что-то воистинну коричневое на вашем пьедестале, при помощи ониксовой пыли
advancements.spectrum.craft_using_pedest: Создайте предмет на пигментном пьедестале, используя самоцветную пыль. Активируйте пьедестал с помощью Кисточки или Редстоуна
advancements.spectrum.create_big_pastel_: Создайте огромную вайдовую сеть, состоящую минимум из 32 узлов
advancements.spectrum.upgrade_pastel_nod: Улучшите Вайдовый Узел, пометив его кольца при помощи определенных ресурсов
Используйте наилучшие улучшения пропускной способности вайдовой сети
Превратите вайдовую сеть в неоправданно дорогую, но бесспорно красивую лампу
advancements.spectrum.create_budding_ony: Создайте цветущий оникс в связывателе душ. Похоже вам больше ненужны слияния
Приготовьте яд с проясняющими, но загадочными свойствами
advancements.spectrum.create_glass_crest: Вставьте Лунокаменное Ядро в Малахитовый инструмент для раскрытия его истинного потенциала
Используйте слизневый идол, чтобы создать гигантского слизня/магмового куба
advancements.spectrum.create_midnight_ab: Соедините Топаз, аметист, Цитрин, Оникс и Неолит для получения Идеального Сплава
Используйте Святыню Слияния, чтобы создать самый тёмный камень в самую тёмную ночь
advancements.spectrum.create_pastel_netw: Создайте Вайдовую Сеть, соединив два Вайдовых Узла
advancements.spectrum.create_resonance_e: Используйте зачарователь для зачарования книги на Резонанс
advancements.spectrum.crumble_midnight_a: Совсем не так 'идеально' как вы хотели. Ваше 'Идеальное Соединение' рассыпалось в прах в ваших руках.
advancements.spectrum.dark_radiance_staf: Измените уровень освещения у света от посоха света до 1
advancements.spectrum.dip_something_into: Некоторые предметы преображаются при контакте с Жидким Кристаллом
advancements.spectrum.drink_tea_with_sco: Выпейте чай со сконом в другой руке. Первоклассно!
advancements.spectrum.eat_each_pastry.de: Попробуйте всю выпечку, которая только есть
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.descr: Используйте зачарователь для переноса зачарований с одной книги на другую. Это недешёго обойдётся...
advancements.spectrum.enchant_book.title: Сжатие без Потерь
advancements.spectrum.enchant_item_worth: Используйте зачарователь для зачарования предмета стоимостью как минимум 2500 опыта.
advancements.spectrum.enchant_seven_leag: Зачаруйте ваши Сапоги-Скороходы, чтобы они были ещё быстрее
advancements.spectrum.enter_dike_gate_pr: Войдите в защитные руины с защитным полем
advancements.spectrum.enter_dimension.de: Узнайте, что располагается под некогда нерушимым бедроком
advancements.spectrum.enter_liquid_cryst: Что произойдёт если вы окунётесь в комбинацию своих знаний?
advancements.spectrum.enter_wireless_red: Войдите в защитные руины с бедроком
advancements.spectrum.equip_neat_ring.de: Создайте и наденьте безумно дорогое кольцо, чтобы утвердить своё эго
advancements.spectrum.equip_pigment_pale: Экипируйте пигментную палитру для облегчения хранения краски. Эту краску можно использовать в посохах
advancements.spectrum.fail_to_take_item_: Активируйте пьедестал с помощью Кисточки или Редстоуна
advancements.spectrum.fill_bottomless_bu: Полностью заполните зачарованный бездонный Мешок, положив в него 2000000000 предметов одного типа
advancements.spectrum.fill_ink_container: Используйте сборщик краски. Краска ведёт себя как газ, передвигаясь по контейнерам
advancements.spectrum.fill_knowledge_gem: Заполните зачарованную жемчужину знаний неисчислимым количеством опыта
advancements.spectrum.fill_potion_pendan: Добавьте зелье в кулон. Положите кулон в мастерскую зелий, как если бы вы клали туда бутылочки
advancements.spectrum.enter_strange_pres: Войдите в необычно мокрые руины, пахнущие благовониями.
advancements.spectrum.solve_strange_pres: Место, в котором ты чуть не склеил ласты... больше нет
advancements.spectrum.find_preservation_: Под землёй вы нашли странное сооружение. Должен быть способ попасть внутрь! Если не сейчас, то потом... Лучше запомните это место.
advancements.spectrum.finish_progression: Доберитесь до конца своего волшебного путешествия. Поздравляю, мастер пигмента!
Завершите весь мод Spectrum, не используя никаких подсказок. Ух ты! Наслаждайтесь своим маленьким подарочком
advancements.spectrum.fish_charged_creep: Выловите Заряженного Крипера. Не расстраивайтесь, скоро и на вашей улице наступит праздник
advancements.spectrum.fish_in_lava.title: Обжигающие Желания
advancements.spectrum.get_azure_dike_cha: Получите единицу азуритовой Защиты, надев азуритовые Украшения
advancements.spectrum.get_hit_while_wear: Получите урон при ношении полного комплекта Самоцветной брони
advancements.spectrum.collect_radiating_: Некоторые Эндермены появляются со странными блоками в руках, которые излучают странную радиацию
advancements.spectrum.get_semi_permeable: Создайте полунепроницаемое стекло для защиты вашего дома от злоумышленников
advancements.spectrum.get_tool_with_iner: Самая быстрая кирка на диком западе
advancements.spectrum.gift_or_open_prese: Подготовьте подарок для кого-то особенного (или самого себя). Пусть этот кто-то откроет его
advancements.spectrum.gift_wet_lava_spon: Передайте мокрую Лавовую Губку другому игроку
advancements.spectrum.grow_bloodstone_in: ...Ибо на твоей руке сидит воля Древних Драконов, их стремление к завоеванию и господству. И увидьте в нём своё отражение
advancements.spectrum.grow_malachite_in_: Малахит растёт о-о-о-очень медленно. Есть ли более быстрый способ?
advancements.spectrum.harvest_moonstruck: Соберите Лунный Нектар в бутылочку с полностью проросшей нефритовой лозы.
advancements.spectrum.have_half_a_heart_: Выпейте свободный дух, вознеситесь и останьтесь только с половиной сердца
advancements.spectrum.high_jump_with_tak: Зарядите пояс подъема до максимума, крадясь. Попрыгали!
advancements.spectrum.hook_entity_with_m: Дай человеку рыбу и он будет сыт весь день. Дай человеку расплавленную удочку, и он начнёт сущий ад на земле
advancements.spectrum.kill_a_mob_with_fr: Убейте существо, пока на вас эффект ярости 3 уровня и выше. Вместо продления, повторное получение эффекта повышает его уровень.
advancements.spectrum.kill_entity_with_i: Убейте существо с помощью швыряния краской. Красться + ПКМ для выбора цвета.
advancements.spectrum.kill_entity_with_j: Наденьте Яростное Кольцо и нанесите неимоверный ущерб вашим врагам, пока вы сами находитесь на грани жизни и смерти
advancements.spectrum.no_rgb.description: Чего вы ещё ожидали? Мы здесь пытаемся CMY сделать! Оставьте RGB у себя на клавиатуре
advancements.spectrum.no_rgb.title: Не очень познавательно
advancements.spectrum.open_mysterious_co: Вставьте лунокаменное ядро в загадочный амулет и откройте его
advancements.spectrum.place_incandescent: Нестабильная амальгама это неимоверно сильная взрывчатка, детонирующая даже при малейшем касании, а после себя оставляет гигансткий горящий кратер. Удачи!
advancements.spectrum.place_pedestal.des: Создайте и поставьте ваш пигментный пьедестал
advancements.spectrum.plant_jade_vines.d: Посадите нефритовую лозу. Как и любая лоза, она растёт вниз. Свет солнца слишком силён для неё, а вот лунный - в самый раз!
advancements.spectrum.plant_ominous_sapl: Вы уверены, что совместив органическую смесь с молодым саженцем создаст что-то интересное
advancements.spectrum.pluck_blood_orchid: Создайте кроворхидею, чтобы получить больше лепестков
advancements.spectrum.pluck_effulgent_fe: §lО БОЖЕ О ЧЁРТ О БОЖЕ О ЧЁРТ О БОЖЕ О ЧЁРТ
advancements.spectrum.potion_mastery.des: Достигните совершенства в использовании реагентов. Вы открыли дополнительный слот!
advancements.spectrum.put_too_many_low_g: Перегрузите ваше животное Платерием настолько, что оно улетит. Пока-пока!
advancements.spectrum.remember_egg_layin: Проявите воспоминание о яйцекладущей шерстяной свинье
В некотором царстве, в некотором государстве...
Попробуйте возродить легендарных существ, но вместо этого получите что-то лучшее!
advancements.spectrum.revive_dead_bush.d: Используйте посох природы на мёртвом кусте для его возрождения
advancements.spectrum.smelt_in_cinderhea: Используйте голубую краску для повышения продукции из Пепельного Очага
advancements.spectrum.smelt_pure_resourc: Пепельный Очаг намного эффективнее переплавляет чистые ресурсы, нежели слабая плавильня
advancements.spectrum.solve_color_mixing: Всего лишь структура, защищенная головоломкой, ничего более
advancements.spectrum.solve_dike_gate_pr: Всего лишь структура, защищенная магическим полем, ничего более
advancements.spectrum.solve_wireless_red: Всего лишь структура, защищенная бедроком, ничего более
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.descripti: История о магии, цвете и хаосе
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.title: Spectrum - Начало Начал
advancements.spectrum.start_crafting_tim: Помните, что вы можете ускорить производительность пьедестала, создав пилоны создания
advancements.spectrum.survive_drinking_i: Выживите после взрыва съеденной нестабильной амальгамы
advancements.spectrum.survive_fatal_slum: Пережевите роковой сон и придите... в опасной близости... к чему.
advancements.spectrum.take_off_belt_over: Слишком сильно зарядите пояс подъема и потеряйте заряд
advancements.spectrum.tame_lizard.title: Друг или Враг? Оба!
advancements.spectrum.tap_aged_air.descr: Вскройте бочку для брожения, в которой в течение нескольких дней не было ничего
advancements.spectrum.tap_aged_air.title: Целая Куча Ничего
advancements.spectrum.tap_chrysocolla.de: Получите нефритовое вино, которое слишком долго настаивалось
advancements.spectrum.tap_poisonous_vodk: Получите отравленную водку. За ваше здоровье!
advancements.spectrum.tap_pure_alcohol.d: Оставьте напиток бродить настолько долго, что он превратится в чистый спирт

Просто чтобы увидеть то, что находится вне зоны досягаемости?

block.spectrum.titration_barrel.recipe_n: Вы без понятия, что внутри. Лучше оставьте всё как есть.
block.spectrum.weathered_polished_shale_: Состаренная плита из полированного глиняного сланца
Состаренные Ступеньки из Полированного Глиняного Сланца
book.spectrum.guidebook.abyssal_vines.pa:
Serpentine stalks and glowing fruit make for an awfully familiar sight. Though dimmer and leafier, it is easy to see that these hanging vines are related to glow berries.\
Given their paleness and crystalline aura, I guess that centuries of darkness and feeding on [Liquid Crystal](entry://general/liquid_crystal) transformed them into something that feels at home in the cool twilight of the abyss.

Naturally, these vines also bear fruit, but it is weirder than I expected. What at first seemed like two berries turned out to be one singular drupe split into two large, plump lobes.\
Their flavor is complex, pungent, and aromatic; a strong sweet and nutty taste is underlined by notes of pine and musk - I think I can even taste some floral notes!

The unripe ones are astringent but good for pickling\
\
*It stopped glowing after picking it off the vine. Big sad.*
The plums are sugary enough that, with some heat, they can be used as a source of white sugar.

The stone of the fruit is oily and rich. Blending it with ash and resin results in bulk fertilizer.\
*The [Vegetal](entry://general/vegetal) is a catalyst and is not consumed.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.aloe.page0.text:
These drought-loving plants can grow almost anywhere. Ironically, as hardy as they are, they seem unable to cope with too much light or nutrient-rich soil.\
\
Down there, there was just no reason to adapt, I guess.
book.spectrum.guidebook.aloe.page1.text:
I can easily break off individual leaves. They retain a lot of moisture and are quite nutritious.\
\
Planted, they will grow into a full new plant over time.
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.page0.t: Although they seem to have been left behind for quite some time, these seeds still look very much alive. I wonder what they will become when they grow.
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.page1.t:
I have never seen anything like it. Such an intense red. So expressive! They really spark my inspiration.\
\
These bushels can be crushed to get more grains or planted on grass as a decorative feature or in a flower pot.
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.page2.t: The taste of Amaranth is as different from Wheat as its appearance. In my mind, completely new ideas sprang up, like this deliciousness.
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.page3.t:
Small but fine pastry filled with cream.\
\
*Perfect with tea.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.page4.t:
This feast is guaranteed to fill my belly for a long time.\
\
*Full of fat and meat and wine and warp!*
book.spectrum.guidebook.amaranth.packed_: Amaranth is just as suitable as wheat for firming mud.
book.spectrum.guidebook.another_roll.pag:
Amount-based drops, such as when using [#](449900)Fortune[#]() to mine ores, [#](449900)Looting[#]() to kill mobs, resulted in a much higher amount.\
Each level of Another Roll increases the chances of getting the highest possible amount.
book.spectrum.guidebook.anvil_crushing.p:
*"To create something new you have to go the way of destruction"\
      - someone, probably*

Until now I have mainly used my [](item://minecraft:anvil) to repair and upgrade tools. But such a heavy object as an Anvil can be of much more use! Why not use it to crush things to dust with sheer force? Like the skulls of my enemies... hehehe! Or items. Yeah, that's probably better.\
\
I can use Item Crushing to crush [Gem Shards](entry://general/shards) into [Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder).\
\
*Tip: The farther the anvil falls, the better.*
Dropping an [](item://minecraft:anvil) on some items will crack them, or turn them into something else entirely.

I am able to crush [#](bb00bb)Flowers[#]() into [#](bb00bb)Dye[#](), [#](bb00bb)Horse Armor[#]() into [#](bb00bb)Ingots[#](), or increase the yield of [#](bb00bb)Blaze Powder[#]() from [#](bb00bb)Blaze Rods[#]().
book.spectrum.guidebook.artisans_atlas.p:
This map shifts and changes as I move, almost as if it were alive, sensing my intentions.\
\
Used in a structure, this atlas will guide me through treacherous terrain, across raging rivers and through dense forests to find similar structures.

*I will travel across the land\
Searching far and wide\
Locating structures map in hand\
Collecting loot that's inside*
It felt like something that I can only describe, as a call from the heavens. A glorious, gathering of forces before [#](449900)Divinity[#]() kicks in.
book.spectrum.guidebook.ashen_circlet.pa:
The [Stratine Gem](entry://general/stratine) I set in this circlet, itself a creation of the Nether, can absorb high temperatures with ease.\
It even protects me from the searing heat of Lava - if only for a short time.\
\
When combined with [#](449900)Fire Resistance[#](), I can swim in Lava almost as if it were Water.

- Prevents all damage from fires and hot floors
- Significantly increases mobility and vision when submerged in lava
- Gives a short duration of Fire Resistance when exposed to intense heat, but requires a cooldown
book.spectrum.guidebook.azalea_tea.page0:
That [Nightdew's](entry://general/nightdew_sprout) essences seem great for getting more sleep in. Steeping them with azalea flowers should results in a sweet smelling infusion ripe with those effects.\
\
*There is something about the day that just makes me unable to get any sleep, this should fix that.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.azure_dike_equip:
The results of combining [Azurite](entry://general/azurite) with the protective properties of [Blue Pigment](entry://general/pigment@blue) really piqued my interest. The material seemed to surround itself with a transparent aura that took some effort to penetrate when I reached for the lump again.\
\
*This is going to be interesting...*

A magical aura surrounding my body, shielding me from incoming damage.\
Slowly but steadily recharges up to a certain amount.\
\
Each piece of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() equipment increases the maximum amount of protection.

- Grants [#](495b24)6[#]() units of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()
- Increases [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() charging

- Grants [#](495b24)8[#]() units of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()
- Increases [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() recovery after a hit, making it recharge quicker

Infusing it with [Blue Ink](entry://ink/ink) in a [Color Picker](entry://ink/color_picker) increases the amount of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]() provided.\
\
Cheap at first, but the required ink per level increases exponentially.
book.spectrum.guidebook.azurite.name: Azurite
book.spectrum.guidebook.azurite.page0.te:
A rich blue ore I found deep underground that, at a distance, I almost mistook for [Lapis](item://minecraft:lapis_lazuli) were it not for the stunning aura that surrounded it. In its natural form it contains many impurities that I must first remove before I can use it for most things.\
\
Seems to be able to intensify the energy of Pigment.
book.spectrum.guidebook.azurite.page1.te:
Refining Azurite is not a cheap task.\
In this refined form Azurite can be used for many more recipes.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bag_of_holding.p:
Placing an [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#](), opening it, and mining it with an enchanted pickaxe is not what I would call fun.\
That's why I made this thing.
All I have to do is open it and the contents of my [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#]() are right there.
I can use various resources and tools that I have come across directly as patterns in the [](item://minecraft:loom).
book.spectrum.guidebook.basal_marble.pag:
A metamorphic stone not unlike marble, found most commonly in [Howling Spires](entry://dimension/howling_spires).\
\
While it resembles marble in many ways, this mineral seems to bear some qualities similar to those of river stones. It is clear to me, that these rocks were formed under torrential currents.
*...if they did form in the aquifers of the deep, then how did they get here? Was this silvered ashscape once an underground sea?*
book.spectrum.guidebook.base_trinkets.pa:
These basic accessories will serve me well as a starting point for more advanced Trinkets.\
All final Trinkets are created in the [Fusion Shrine](entry://general/fusion_shrine).
book.spectrum.guidebook.bedrock_anvil.pa:
I've used my Anvil plenty (a lot of Anvils, actually). [Item Crushing](entry://general/item_crushing), repairing and enchanting are burning a hole in my iron supply.\
To make the Anvil last longer - indestructible, in fact - Bedrock seems like the perfect choice.\
\
It allows me to rename items for free and has no maximum repair limit.

It also allows me to add descriptions to my items, as well as a spark of color with some pigment.\
\
*Pro tip: "\n" will split the text into multiple lines.*\
*Also, leaving the name field blank will reset the name.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.bedrock_armor.pa:
The strongest material I could find so far was Netherite. However, repairing [#](bb00bb)Netherite Armor[#]() was more expensive than making the armor itself. Also, the protection decreased with each scratch. All this is less of a problem if the armor simply *cannot* be damaged in the first place.\
\
*Never wilt, stone blossom.*
The Bedrock Helmet comes with **Projectile Protection V**.
The Bedrock Chestplate comes with **Protection V**.
The Bedrock Leggings come with **Blast Protection V**.
The Bedrock Boots come with **Fire Protection V**.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bedrock_dust.pag: Even Bedrock was not strong enough to withstand my newly created "life". It burst through Bedrock like dandelions through concrete.

Note to myself: Should I be reading my old notes here while some of [that stuff](entry://general/ruin) is still out there, I should change that as soon as possible, or I *might* regret it.\
\
Luckily I've already invented a [suitable counteragent](entry://general/decay_away).
The chunks of Bedrock are so sturdy, that a normal [](item://minecraft:crafting_table) can't handle them. But my [Pigment Pedestal](entry://general/pedestal) handles them no problem.
These seem so sturdy that not even a Wither would be able to break through them.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bedrock_tools.pa:
Whenever I enter a new world I go about the mindless, days-long task of gathering villagers around me, turning them into zombies and healing them, only for one of them to eventually hand me a book of [#](449900)Mending[#](). All this just so I don't have to repair my tools.\
Neither exciting nor species-appropriate. Now I have a much more humane solution.
The Bedrock Pickaxe comes with **Silk Touch**.
The Bedrock Axe comes with **Efficiency VI**.
The Bedrock Shovel comes with **Efficiency VI**.
The Bedrock Sword comes with **Sharpness VI**.
The Bedrock Hoe comes with **Fortune IV**.
The Bedrock Bow comes with **Power VI**.
The Bedrock Crossbow comes with **Quick Charge IV**.
The Bedrock Shears come with **Efficiency VI**.
The Bedrock Fishing Rod comes with **Luck of the Sea IV**.
My new magic fishing rods have the interesting property of attracting even living creatures. Why didn't my boring rods do that before? I don't know.\
\
With this enchantment, I can further increase my chances of catching living creatures.
Increases the chance of catching living creatures when fishing.\
\
Max Level: 3\
Applicable to Spectrum's Fishing Rods.
book.spectrum.guidebook.biomes.name: Abyssal Biomes
book.spectrum.guidebook.biomes.page0.tex: I still can't imagine how diverse the area down there can be. I mean... if no sunlight ever touches these areas, what can grow there? Sunlight and Water are the basic requirements for life and at least for the Sun part...
book.spectrum.guidebook.biomes.page1.tex: I would be pleased if I can refute my own statement.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth.cluster_:
When fully grown I can crush the cluster to get more flakes.\
I went through the calculations and it seems like the process is self-sustaining!
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth.crystal_: *Well, if I disregard the catalysts and Ink required, at least...*
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth.name: Bismuth
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth.page0.te:
A metal that shimmers in all the colors of the rainbow.\
The little seedlings I collected are far too small to be of any meaningful use.\
\
How do I grow them without a budding block? One thing I noticed: buds seem react to metallic blocks in close vicinity, just like a beacon.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth.page1.te: Instead of sacrificing entire blocks of metal, the [Crystallarieum](entry://ink/crystallarieum) provides a controlled substrate that serves as a more efficient way to deliver nutrients.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bismuth_trinkets: Bismuth, this material immediately piqued my interest! The way it shines, it is predestined as a base for jewelry and with my now practiced skill, I was actually able to shape it. Beautiful.
It is always slightly warm and even glows softly in the dark. I'd better not ask myself why.
book.spectrum.guidebook.black_hole_chest:
The problem with hoppers is that they are not only slow, but their lack of range makes them ill-suited to larger farms.\
\
With a little Blue Pigment, all items within a wide radius of this chest-like mechanism can easily be brought to safety.
Radius of 12 blocks. Can be disabled by placing a solid block on top. Offers filters to specify which items it sucks in.
Putting a [Knowledge Gem](entry://enchanting/knowledge_gem) in a Black Hole Chest will allow it to absorb XP orbs, transferring the experience into the gem.
book.spectrum.guidebook.black_langast.pa:
What must have happened here to turn whole swathes of land into this dead wasteland? Some terrible accident, for sure. Whatever - or whoever - was responsible for this may have had a [similar experience to mine](entry://general/midnight_aberration)... only much more tragic.\
\
The *things* growing here - to call them plants would be an insult even to [#](bb00bb)Dead Bushes[#]() - look anything but healthy.
A common, dark and sturdy stone that makes up much of the lower levels of the Deeper Down.
The [](item://minecraft:blast_furnace) smelts these stones faster than a [](item://minecraft:furnace).
book.spectrum.guidebook.block_breaker.pa:
A simple but effective way of destroying blocks. Neither the most sophisticated nor the most customisable, but easy to set up and very compact.\
\
A Redstone signal causes it to destroy the block in front of it.
Can break blocks up to iron tier.
book.spectrum.guidebook.block_detector.p:
Similar to an [#](bb00bb)Observer[#](), but more specific.\
Gives off a [#](449900)redstone pulse[#]() each time a block is placed in front of it that matches the block below it (or above it, if facing down).
book.spectrum.guidebook.block_flooder.pa:
Like a caveman, I've always had to run around illuminating caves or closing their unsightly entrances in my immediate vicinity. To relieve myself of this task I took inspiration from the self-replicating abilities of [Fading](entry://general/fading) and developed the Block Flooder.\
If I throw one into a narrow path, pond or ravine, it will fill up with blocks - in 5%% of the time the result even looks acceptable!
Pulls matching blocks directly from my inventory to fill the gaps. If I don't have any matching ones, it falls back to [](item://minecraft:cobblestone).
book.spectrum.guidebook.block_placer.pag:
Automatically breaking blocks, weighing them, sorting them or putting them in one of my chests is easy. But there is one thing that all my previous machines could never do: place things. That is now a thing of the past.\
[Topaz](entry://general/shards@topaz), with its affinity for matter, allows it to materialize blocks from its inventory.
book.spectrum.guidebook.block_variants.p:
Perhaps the blocks that shielded my precious gems from external influences also absorbed some of the magical properties of the geodes themselves?\
Who knows. They definitely look pretty and make for great building blocks.

The brilliant white of Calcite is perhaps one of the brightest natural colors I've come across - very clean looking and exuding dignity. It contrasts beautifully with the dark and noble tones of Basalt.

The application of heat emphasizes their light and dark textures even more.\
When smelted, the Basalt turns almost black. They can be crafted into a wide variety of decorative blocks using the [](item://minecraft:crafting_table) or [](item://minecraft:stonecutter).
book.spectrum.guidebook.blood_orchid_pet:
These leaves seem to belong to a flower I have never seen before. Did it bloom here once? Was it grown by those who came before me? Perhaps a souvenir from a world I do not even know exists?\
Yet it looks like as if it was plucked only five minutes ago.

\
\
\
\
I feel something every time I touch the petal:\
*restlessness*.
book.spectrum.guidebook.blood_orchid_pro:
[Blood Orchid](entry://general/blood_orchid) extracts have an intense effect when consumed: they can put the creature into a [#](449900)Frenzy[#]().\
Damage, attack speed, movement speed and knockback resistance are buffed with each kill. The higher the level of the effect, the greater the buff. Not scoring a kill in 10 seconds will apply a debuff instead.

Rather than resetting the duration, applying another [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect will instead increase its potency.\
\
To get the most out of the effect, I should apply a long duration effect first, then stack up with shorter, but more potent ones.
I managed to extract the active ingredient of a Blood Orchid Petal into a thick solution. It almost smells like rose water, but its effect is definitely... *a little more effervescent*.
The [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect starts low, but lasts a bit longer.
The [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect is relatively short, but starts off quite powerful.
A truly nasty brew. It tastes exactly as you would expect.
book.spectrum.guidebook.blood_orchids.pa: [Resonant Lilies](entry://general/resonant_lily)! Truly an elusive flower - and apparently related to the Blood Orchid in some way (though the Blood Orchid's energy quickly takes over).
Whelp, what's the worst that can happen? Hopefully me ending up with another plant that I can pluck petals from.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bloodstone.name: Bloodstone
book.spectrum.guidebook.bloodstone.page0: Crystallized speckles of blood from [Kindling Feathers](entry://creating_life/effulgent_feathers), shining in stunning scarlet and bleeding with willful magic!
book.spectrum.guidebook.bloodstone.page1: Given a ***[#](ff3d71)precarious[#]()*** amount of [#](bb00bb)Copper[#](), it  will grow into a grand slab of red, vibrant glass.
book.spectrum.guidebook.bottomless_bundl:
On my travels through the underground I collect a whole lot of mundane, identical blocks - which I will never need, but that's not the point! I am not a hoarder, *promise*.\
\
The Bottomless Bundle stores a virtually unlimited number of items, but only of one type.
Right-clicking it on stacks or empty slots in my inventory will fill / empty it.
Crouching places it down, making it possible to fill / empty it automatically.

A placed Bottomless Bundle will always remember the last item I put into it.\
Even if it is emptied it will only accept new items previously held, making it usable as a filter.\
\
*Note: If it is placed empty, it will accept the first item put into it and lock to that.*

Power increases its capacity tenfold per level.\
\
*That's a **lot** of storage. Can I completely fill one with Power V?*

Curse of the Void will void all items that would overfill the Bottomless Bundle.\
\
*No more useless blocks cluttering my path when mining.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.brewers_handbook: *Reflection Of The Moon*
Brewing for the Deep

Hayo! The current state of relations between the overworld and the deep is rather poor, and sadly it seems to only be getting worse, and there's not much I can do about it.\
\
So I've have taken some of my time to collect a bunch of brewing recipes from the surface, adapt them to use ingredients found in our depths, and publish that as a gift to you all, in the hope that it will aid you.

*Burns on the way down and when it gets there too.\
\
 Great if you have someone you want to get hot and bothered.*

Hi. I'm sorry I did not get more to you all, this is all I could manage to sneak in - anything passing by the mouth of the caves is closely watched, and I myself can feel the gaze of the surface emperors scorching my back. I really, really wanted to do more, but the fact that I have to use a pseudonym should reveal the state of my condition. This is all I can do. I hope it will be enough.
[Hidden Page 1]
*This took a lot out of me to get working. Through this, you should be able to use blood orchid extract more aggressively. If worse comes to worst, it should give you an edge.*

...Asteras\
I hope that this message will reach you. The state of things has only worsened since we last spoke, the nobles are still targeting you, but more worryingly.... They are preparing for war, it is clear by now. They want the Bloomstone, and they are willing to sacrifice a lot for it. Things are going to get bad, please stay safe.\
        *...I miss you.*
[Hidden Page 2]

\
Heya, glass peaches are not just for emperors!\
\
We can enjoy them too! This quick and easy to follow recipe makes for a nice, creamy cup of peachy goodness - if you have any, and I understand why you don't, then sweet berries make for a great garnish!
Pink Cups
*Do not exchange the berries out for holly ones, they are no good...*

\
Those thickets of pyrite... they are I think my favorite places in the depths, there is something just so pretty about them, even considering for how dangerous just existing in them is.\
\
Regardless! While the berries of the bushes that grow there are poisonous, we can side step that...
Holly Hot Drinks
*But if you do want to use those holly berries for something, here you go.*

\
This not mead, you could not legally call it mead, I am obligated to clarify it is not mead.\
\
\
 So this mead is a bit of a favorite recipe of mine, it took a while to figure out how to adapt honey wine for a place that has no bees, but trust me, this genuinely outdoes the real deal.
Not Honey Wine
*Not a mead, no no no.*

\
Myceylon, that odd cinnamon-esque spice you all have down there. I am honestly really fond of the stuff, it reminds me of those long, tender nights I used to spend down there. Though like most, I associate the spice with a level of warmth and comfort, for me there is this undertone of longing...
Heat for the Heart
book.spectrum.guidebook.poisoners_handbo: Silver and Velvet

Dreams of deep light, of an age of peace... it was long ago and yet I still remember it so vibrantly.\
\
Such beautiful things, threads of shimmering silver weaving amidst a sea of velvet. It caressed and guided me, so that I may lay eyes unto derelict stars.\
By higher spheres a gift was I granted, but I knew not what to do with it, until I met a curious man.

He was an astrologer. But even though he bore the emblem of those of flame, his allegiances were not with Imperator Miros.\
\
He had seen truth as I had, but he was brave unlike me. He sought out that dream-tinted constellation - those same stars - and in it found truth; an enlightenment that he decided to pass onto me, when he was still around.
In Memory

When I was lost and afraid, he found me and granted me comfort. I had just been ousted by my fellow kin, cast away by my own blood after being deemed bereft of the blessings of the flame.\
\
He taught me the ways of our brethren. The path of the sinner and the conniver, of the dreamer and the poisoner.\
\
And I relished in this fate.

Ever since he took me in as his disciple, I've kept this journal - jutting down important lessons and writing about every notable thing that happened in our shared journey... but now that he has passed, I have decided to dedicate this handbook to him.\
\
*Forever will I remember, but never will I speak it*\
*He wished for his name to remain hidden, and I will honor that until my own death.*\
**~ Manxi**
Victory...

*Here I set to paper.*\
\
*The memory, of a triumph.*\
\
*The radiance, the seduction...*\
\
*...of an aether shard, pure and true.*\
\
*A small victory of Silver and Velvet over Gold and Scarlet - A trophy taken not by might, but by gentleness.*

*Our silent betrayal worked.\
We took it and bestowed it nectar.*
Hideaway at the Gardens

Today marks a wondrous occasion. My Master and his fellows have convened, and together, they agreed to promote me.\
\
I have been chosen to become keeper of this hideaway!\
\
What an honor... there is a lot to be done with so many coming here after the dragons' treachery, but I will not disappoint.

I remember still when these halls were so quiet. A silent garden showered by falling leaves hidden away deep within the undergrowth. Those were calmer times, but seeing so many new faces around, from all walks of life, is delightful! The inadequacy of the old path has brought people to us and to the truth.\
\
Sourcing enough Nightdew has become rather troublesome though.
Lavender Tinctures

Besides my managerial duties, my most important tasks pertain to the sourcing and refining of soporific extracts.\
\
Poisons, tinctures, medicine, oils... they all demand the retorts run day and night, both as I wake and as I dive into *deep communion*.\
\
Of course it is no big issue, I am well learned with such apparatus, but it can be stressful.

Alcohol is an important medium in night alchemy, as most essences of somnolence will dissolve readily in it.\
\
*Velvet Brandy is often in high demand for our more combative brethren.*

Nightdew is the root and heart of night alchemy, of all sleep magic, and of our voyage unto calm waters.\
Those silver flowers adorned with velvety purple and shimmering like the night sky. They bleed with sacred nectar that we yearn for, but is in increasingly short supply as smugglers grow scarce and the empire restless.\
\
Growing it is the only option.
Tending to Nightdew

The verdigris vines long for another to dream with them. The more slumber near them, the more likely they are to blossom.\
\
*There was this woman, Rubrea, who I met a while ago. She was as stunning as these burgeons, and she had a delightful derrière... maybe I should save one for her.*
Lotus of the Deep Sea

The endless sea terrifies me.\
\
Though I have slumbered many times, there is something deeply unsettling about it. Just peering at it, at the bottomless sea, the bottomless dream... it...\
\
...\
\
I am ashamed of my cowardice.

Whenever I can muster the bravado to gaze into the depths, I have witnessed glowing filaments. Silvered sparkles of stark white piercing the endless inky haze. A mesmerizing radiance.\
Those threads of light guide us.\
\
It has shown me aberrant constellations, stars which whispered to me - to us - to seek pale light, pure and true.

Panacea and poison are much more alike than what most would think. Often it is simply a matter of dose.\
While I would rather it not be this way, the rituals we must partake in often demand we straddle that line.\
\
This nectar-kissed extract of jadeite is a common reagent used in annointing and, for the especially dedicated folk, consumption.
A Precarious Gambit

*The calmness that my Master shows whenever he imbibes this... even his fellow astrologers are often surprised.*\
\
*Such stoicism will never cease to amaze me.*

Today marks my return. I was gone from the keep for two weeks, having traveled to Varia to spend some time with Rubrea. We can't often meet because of our duties - her being a mercenary and me a keeper of the gardens. But the time we spent together was incredible. She is so strong and untamed and... breathtaking.\
\
...but sadly, she is not the main reason why I am writing this.

Varia was much as I remembered it, though it was odd returning home after so long. But there was something worrying, something that made the air run thick.\
\
Legates, of the church of Azaleas, hiding in the shadows and lurking in every corner. I had... heard rumors of it, but I didn't actually expect that the imperials would start an inquisition.\
\
**This is dire**.

I... I can barely bring myself to write this.\
Today, as he was in ritual communion, delving into the bottomless sea, my master... did not wake up. He dived too deep, and was lost to barren waters.\
\
I don't *know* what I am going to do now. When I had been discarded by my family, he took me in. He wiped away my tears and reassured me, and he raised me to be what I am today.\
He... was a father to me, and now he is gone.

This hazy liquor, dark like the celestial sea... it is what is used for our most basal magics. My master used to look after the recipe for it, but I suppose now it is up to me to do so.\
\
*Like sleep, like death.*\
*Lost in the sea... did he find the mercy?*

Things have grown terribly quiet around the gardens lately. It is not as if there were ever more than one or two dozen people here due to how hidden this place is but... almost nobody comes here now\
\
\
This may be my last journal entry for a while. It is so quiet now...

I'd love to say that it is just an uneventful time, or that Master's peers are just taking some time off to mourn. But I fear that this is the result of Miros' inquisition.\
There may not be very many of us left out there, and those that remain are likely in hiding.\
\
*I am alone.*

\
I can hear them, stomping above me. Inquisitors.\
\
This place is so far away from anything, they could not have found us.\
Somebody betrayed me. And now I am going to die here, alone and again abandoned.\
\
*Miros... You whore, I hope you choke.*\
\
*(the writing here is shaky, the pages stained with tears)*

\
I *cannot* let them get to me, I know what they do to blasphemers\
\
There is only one way out.\
\
The same path that my Master once took, the path that I was too afraid to follow... it is time.\
\
**Let us go together**

Due to the nature of the magic that we deal with, accidental poisonings can be concerningly common - especially among apprentices. A versatile, generally applicable antidote is essential to be able to safely step into the waters of the endless sea.\
\
Extracts of jadevine blossoms are known to be excellent for this, though they can be difficult to source in satisfying quantities.
Remedies
*This recipe is a personal creation of mine. It uses the soporific qualities of burgeons to calm the spiritis of the extracts, stabilizing them and allowing them to be stored in a pure form.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.brown_is_weird.p:
I tried and tried, to no avail. I can't imagine a way to create [#](70400d)Brown[#]() by mixing [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder), even when using saplings. The closest I came was a washed-out orange - ugh.\
It can't be that hard. Like... [#](70400d)Dirt is brown[#]() and it's the most common stuff I have around.\
\
There must be a way...\
and I'm sure **[#](000000)Black[#]()** will be the answer.

\
\
\
\
\
\
*Seriously, I researched! The way we perceive brown is fascinating!*
book.spectrum.guidebook.budding_onyx.pag:
Crafting [Onyx](entry://general/onyx_shards) was always very tricky, as it depended on the current phase of the moon. Even though the [Crescent Clock](entry://equipment/crescent_clock) is a thing, I often missed this short time window.\
Making Onyx growable like the other gems will save me a lot of time.\
\
*Strangely, the same procedure doesn't seem to work for the others?*
Best to craft a large batch of [Midnight Aberrations](entry://general/midnight_aberration) all at once, as they seem to crumble in my hands quickly.
book.spectrum.guidebook.buffer_node.name: Buffer Node
book.spectrum.guidebook.buffer_node.page:
A modified Gather Node. It will request items from storage from whence they will be available for other Gather Nodes.\
\
Specify the items to be collected in its [#](449900)filter[#]().
book.spectrum.guidebook.calming.page0.te: Drinking this [#](449900)seems to reduce enemy spawns and aggression,[#]() scaling with level. Most creatures will even tolerate me being closer to them.
book.spectrum.guidebook.calming.page1.te: The pacifying qualities of this seem to make me substantially more vulnerable to sleep, huh.
book.spectrum.guidebook.celestial_pocket:
The problem with [Onyx Shards](entry://general/onyx_shards) is that their creation is tied to very specific conditions. A new moon does not happen every day. And, of course, every time I look at the clock, the window of time seems to have just passed by exactly a minute.\
\
Time to bring out the big guns: Magenta's affinity for time.
book.spectrum.guidebook.cheong.page0.tex: I didn't think fruit could need any additional sweetening. But thickened with sugar like that, the flavour of the fruit comes out even better.
book.spectrum.guidebook.cheong.page1.tex: *It's a marmalade... It's a Syrup... It's Cheong!*
book.spectrum.guidebook.chrysocolla.page:
My latest result of fermenting wine turned out a *bit* too strong.\
Immensely bitter and slightly acidic in taste.\
While it retains some of the properties it once resembled, it seems to me to be more useful for medicine than for drinking.
book.spectrum.guidebook.cinderhearth.pag:
A state-of-my-art Blast Furnace that consumes [#](e16201)Orange Ink[#]() to smelt ores and the like.\
\
I can further enhance its abilities using [Upgrades](entry://magical_blocks/upgrades).
Putting in a [Knowledge Gem](entry://enchanting/knowledge_gem) will funnel experience gained from smelting XP into it.
Upgrades must be placed on the two Chiseled Blocks.

- 1 Cinderhearth
- 21 Polished Blocks
- 6 Crest Blocks
- 5 Glass-like Blocks
- 2 Chiseled Blocks
- 6 Buckets of Lava

\
*Did it really need that [#](bb00bb)Lava[#]() underneath since I already have [#](e16201)Ink[#]()*?\
No, not really. But it looks so. much. better.

[Upgrades](entry://magical_blocks/upgrades) placed on the [#](bb00bb)Chiseled Blocks[#]() require an additional type of [Ink](entry://ink/ink), depending on the type of Upgrade. The higher the upgrades level, the higher the consumption.

- Speed ([#](aa32a0)Magenta Ink[#]()):
faster smelt times
- Yield ([#](258ac8)Light Blue Ink[#]()):
chance to multiply the output
- Experience ([#](ff4ff6)Purple Ink[#]()):
vastly increases experience gain
- Efficiency ([#](302951)Black Ink[#]()):
vastly decreased Ink consumption of other types, including [#](e16201)Orange[#]()
book.spectrum.guidebook.circlet_of_arrog:
That's it: Ascension - the ultimate buff - in wearable form.\
\
If my very existence wasn't in danger every time I got hit too hard - a very high price to pay - I wouldn't hesitate for a second to put this on.\
Should I really...?\
\
Of course.
book.spectrum.guidebook.clover.clover.te:
Plains and other green biomes are home to these lush green clovers, sprouting with life.\
\
*Is today my lucky day?*
book.spectrum.guidebook.clover.clover_cr: I can crush it for some [](item://minecraft:green_dye).
book.spectrum.guidebook.clover.four_leaf:
Indeed it is!\
I'm sure this tiny sign of luck will come in handy.

I can crush it for *quite some* Green Dye.\
\
Why so much more dye?\
It has more leaves, obviously!
book.spectrum.guidebook.clovers_favor.pa:
Every once in a while, I'm lucky enough to have an enemy drop a single rare item.\
The connection of [Clovers](entry://general/clover) to luck will allow me to increase those odds immensely.

Increased chance of getting rare loot drops, such as [#](bb00bb)Iron Ingots[#]() from Zombies.\
*May even increase my chances of getting the most valuable of all drops?*\
\
Max Level: 3\
Applicable to melee weapons.\
Mutually exclusive with Looting.
book.spectrum.guidebook.color_mixing_bla:
\
\
\
The blackness of Onyx allows me a few more combinations. Still not perfect, but fantastic progress!\
\
What about grey tones? Maybe I'll come up with another idea...
book.spectrum.guidebook.color_mixing_cmy: How to combine and not combine colors

I can create any color by mixing the primary colors [#](157687)Cyan[#](), [#](aa32a0)Magenta[#]() and [#](f0af15)Yellow[#]()!\
*...in theory*.

My attempts to mix [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder) directly have not been very successful. Just crafting them together just will not do.\
\
But now I have another idea:\
the closeness of my gemstones to nature suggests that *nature* could be the answer, too!\
\
[This recipe](entry://general/colored_trees) looks very promising and worth a try! I used the [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder) to infuse [#](bb00bb)Saplings[#]() as a middleman instead.
book.spectrum.guidebook.color_mixing_whi:
\
\
**It's incredible!**\
\
Seeing the full colour spectrum after such a long, arduous journey and many failures makes my heart happy. I can't wait to see what creative innovations will flow through my brush next.
book.spectrum.guidebook.color_picker.pag:
Converts [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) into pure [Ink](entry://ink/ink) so I can transfer it into containers, such as [Ink Flasks](entry://ink/ink_flask).\
\
Unfortunately - [because of the way Ink is transferred](entry://ink/ink@transfer) - there is always some left over. Kind of annoying... although I see some benefit in it, too: The bigger the difference between containers, the faster the transfer!
*Never develop a passion you can't afford. It'll eat away at your heart like a bookworm.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_lamps.pa:
I have finally managed to mix color properly! What could be more natural than testing out the properties of my new [Pigments](entry://general/pigment) right away?\
\
*I've had enough of the normal [#](bb00bb)Redstone Lamps[#]() by now. Time to add some color!*
They are surrounded by a vibrant light when activated.
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_spore_bl:
One day, while wandering through a leafy cave, I noticed many petals sailing through the air.\
\
I was so enchanted by this sight that I set out to create my own, colorful variations. Beautiful, aren't they?

By choosing different Pigment I am able to color the petals in a wide range of colors.\
\
The recipes require specific combination of [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder) per color, corresponding to the [amount I noted to mix it](entry://general/color_mixing_cmy).
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_trees.pa:
I need to mix my pigments with something organic. Through experimentation, I have found that the roots of [#](bb00bb)Saplings[#]() absorb the color in the [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder) with ease. Pure Color pulsates through their tiny stems and first few leaves already.\
\
How will they look when fully grown?
The recipes require specific combination of [Gemstone Powder](entry://general/gemstone_powder) per color, corresponding to the [amount I noted to mix it](entry://general/color_mixing_cmy).
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_trees.na: Wow, those trees existed around me all along and I did not even know it! Who knows what else is out there.
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_trees.co: Like their non-colored, non-magical counterparts, I can strip the logs and use their wood for Planks, Stairs, Slabs, Buttons, Pressure Plates, Fences and Fence Gates.
book.spectrum.guidebook.colored_trees.le:
[Crushing colored leaves with an Anvil](entry://general/item_crushing) will always give me some Pigment.\
\
*It's not much, but it's honest work.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.compacting_chest:
I have long since had enough of creating new storage space for all the coal, iron, copper and gold piling up in my storeroom. On that note I am also tired of crafting this stuff into more compact clumps...\
\
The Compacting Chest takes this monotonous work off my hands.

The name says it all:\
crafts all the things in it using a 3x3, 2x2 or 1x1 pattern - able to be toggled in its inventory.
book.spectrum.guidebook.conflicting_ench:
Today is the day where I put the problems I used to have enchanting my items with multiple, conflicting enchantments behind me.\
As a master of enchanting, nothing is left to my wishes now.

I can now use the Enchanter to apply enchantments that are normally mutually exclusive.\
\
*Such actions will require a LOT of experience*
As the simplest of nodes the Connection Node has no active use.\
\
They solely act as a cheap and unobtrusive way of extending the reach of my networks.
Like all other nodes, the Connection Node has a range of 12 blocks.
book.spectrum.guidebook.constructors_sta:
I spend a lot of time placing blocks, so much so that I could almost believe that this is the main reason for my existence. But placing a lot of similar blocks is tedious.\
\
Or rather: *was* tedious.
When sneaking, expands based on all blocks instead of just matching ones.
book.spectrum.guidebook.cotton_cloud_boo:
Being able to fly like the birds has always been a dream of many people, including myself.\
\
I designed these boots to make it happen. The freedom is almost overwhelming! (*I didn't quite get it right without a little catch, but what can you do.*)

Little clouds will start to form beneath my feet as soon as I start sprinting. While too fuzzy to jump on, they are enough to keep me safely suspended in the air.\
\
There's just one kicker:\
*I'd better not stop sprinting high up*.
book.spectrum.guidebook.crafting: I can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with this enchantment by surrounding the [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](entry://general/pigment) and the other necessary materials.
The Crafting Tablet is so much more than just a portable [](item://minecraft:crafting_table). It remembers the recipe I insert and lets me craft it on demand later.

There may come a time when I need a certain material so often that I want to automate it. Or maybe I will become one of those masochists who automates every single item just because I can.\
\
The [Pigment Pedestal](entry://general/pedestal) has a dedicated slot for a Crafting Tablet. If I add a Crafting Tablet and then hopper items into it, they will be placed as specified in the saved recipe.
book.spectrum.guidebook.crawfish.page0.t:
Look what my last fishing trip brought ashore! It is not actually a fish, but a *crustacean*.\
\
They seem to thrive even in the [muddiest of ponds](entry://magical_blocks/mud).
book.spectrum.guidebook.creating_enchant:
Using [Pigment](entry://general/pigment), selected ingredients and some experience the [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter) enables me to add Enchantments to [regular Books](item://minecraft:book).\
\
While this process consumes more experience than enchanting in a common Enchanting Table, I have granular control over which Enchantment I want to create.
I can also use this process to enchant my magical tools.
book.spectrum.guidebook.creature_manipul: Works for every color of Axolotl.

My whole "creating life" thing has had mixed results so far. But I'm starting to feel confident that I can achieve *something*.\
\
Creating life from nothing is a difficult thing, but combining existing knowledge?\
\
Is that how Frankenstein felt? *Does this make me bad? Evil? I am not at all sure, but I am very much willing to try.*
Works for every color of Parrot.
Works for every color of Shulker.
book.spectrum.guidebook.creatures.name: Creatures of the Deep
I didn't expect so much... life down here in the endless darkness. Or anything, for that matter.\
\
I'm curious to see what's scurrying around down there.
I hope I don't regret this curiosity.
book.spectrum.guidebook.crescent_clock.p:
This clock, made up of witnesses to time, is to guide me through this never-ending stream of beginnings and endings - the phases of the moon.\
\
\
\
*If we shadows have offended, Know but this and all is mended.*

*That you have but slumbered here, While these visions did appear.\
And this weak and idle theme, No more yielding, but a dream.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.crystal_apotheca:
Placed in [Geodes](entry://general/geodes), it automatically harvests fully grown [#](bb00bb)Gemstone Clusters[#]().\
\
Normally, all my other constructions and even crops freeze in time when I am far away, but this one seems to be an exception to that norm. Strange.
Although not as efficient as breaking clusters by hand, the ease of use is a definite plus.
The [Crystal Apothecary](entry://ink/crystal_apothecary) can automatically harvest [#](bb00bb)Crystals[#]() - even when I am nowhere near the geodes!
The crystal gardens of the deep are truly a spectacle to behold. While there is a lot I could comment on, there are these crystalline flowers that caught my eye in particular.\
\
Their petals of glass and their dashing shimmer... they are very lovely little things.
Sweet and fragrant. I bet they'd taste like strawberry, as liquid crystal would if either of them were edible...

Very herbal and bitter.\
\
*They resemble apricots only in color.*

On one hand, these are an excellent source of glowing dye.\
\
*On the other hand, my tongue has tinnitus.*
Fluffy, these things.\
They remind me a lot of a creature I once read about in legends. It is said to be long extinct.
Lakes of [Liquid Crystal](entry://general/liquid_crystal) and giant [crystalline structures](entry://dimension/hummingstone) define its appearance.

The ground is covered with a small layer of soil. Not much, but more than enough to cover it with a thick carpet of moss.\
\
Unlike most other biomes, the many natural light sources in this one seem to allow for the growth of plants here, which I can also find on the surface.
book.spectrum.guidebook.crystallarieum.p:
With budding blocks in mind, I designed an Ink-powered device that is able to grow chunks of raw ore into sparkling crystals.\
\
Though my best efforts at growing [gems](entry://general/shards) failed, I quickly realised that it could grow all sorts of other resources, when I throw them on it.

Growing resources requires:
- a starter bud thrown in
- catalysts thrown in
- a specific color of Ink, supplied via [Flask](entry://ink/ink_flask)

Each catalyst has a different effect on bud growth:\
while one catalyst may reduce the amount of ink required, another may alter the time required.

[#](449900)Metallic resources[#]() require unrefined materials such as [#](bb00bb)Raw Iron[#](), resulting in a [#](bb00bb)Small Iron Bud[#]() that will grow steadily until it can be safely harvested.\
\
For [#](449900)crystalline resources[#](), an existing crystal can be used as a seed to grow identical copies of itself.
book.spectrum.guidebook.curse_of_the_voi:
Tools with this enchantment seem to dissolve all things they mine into thin air. Broken down into the finest sand and blown away by the wind.\
\
When I want to knock half a city out of rough stone, it might even come in handy. Some things are probably a curse and a blessing at the same time.

Destroys the drops of all broken blocks.\
\
Max Level: 1\
Applicable to mining tools.
book.spectrum.guidebook.deadly_poison.pa: Normally, poison was something I had to watch out for, but there was never a chance of being carried away by it. This more potent variety, on the other hand, *seems* to be out for my life. Scary stuff!
book.spectrum.guidebook.decay_away.page0:
Not only did my last experiment fail, but it was also quite a pain to get rid of.\
Just in case things ever get out of hand again, I created this modified version. This time, though, it's for healing rather than flooding my base.\
It definitely doesn't hurt to have a bottle with me.
book.spectrum.guidebook.decay_away.page1: Gets rid of 99%% of all self-replicating microorganisms.
book.spectrum.guidebook.decostones.name: Decostones
book.spectrum.guidebook.decostones.page0:
These stackable ornamental stones will be a great representation of my precious find.\
\
They make quite an imposing impression.
book.spectrum.guidebook.deep_barrens.pag:
At first glance, there's not much to see here, but it's well worth a visit: ores smile at me from every corner as far as I can see (which is not far, to be honest).\
\
In some places, gigantic veins of ore crisscross this biome. A single vein will probably last me for years.
book.spectrum.guidebook.deep_dripstone_c:
Judging by the size of the Dripstones, these caves must have been around since the beginning of time.\
I wonder how big the giant stalactites can get here. I've seen ones that span hundreds of blocks already.\
The ground is speckled with puddles of [#](bb00bb)Water[#]().
book.spectrum.guidebook.delving_deeper_d:
I wouldn't have thought it possible. As I burst deeper and deeper down through the bedrock, a pitch-black portal opened up. Where does it lead? Only one way to find out.\
\
*Still, I can't get rid of the lump in my throat as I look down...*

A place that has not seen a single ray of sunlight for eons. A place where the sun never shines. A place shrouded in eternal darkness.\
\
What's waiting to be discovered by me down there?
book.spectrum.guidebook.density.page0.te:
[#](449900)Makes me heavier[#]() with each level, making me take increased fall damage. I could not even make long jumps anymore.\
\
*Is that how I will feel every day in 30 years?*
The Zombies I encounter every night wear a lot of valuable equipment. But when they die, it disappears never to be seen again (how exactly this works is a mystery to me).\
\
No problem if I manage to snatch it from them while they are still alive, though. Gotcha!
Small chance for mobs (and other players!) to drop their equipment on each hit.\
\
Max Level: 2\
Applicable to melee weapons.
book.spectrum.guidebook.discovered_geode: Scattered around the world I have discovered numerous geodes that produce valuable resources.
book.spectrum.guidebook.disinfect:
More to disinfect than to drink.\
\
*But, you know... is anyone going to stop me?*
book.spectrum.guidebook.divinity.page0.t:
I received major buffs to all major attributes.\
\
But I fear a terrible, ([close to](entry://creating_life/hardcore_revival)) irreversible cost, should I still die.
book.spectrum.guidebook.doomblooms.name: Doomblooms
book.spectrum.guidebook.doomblooms.page0:
This plant has a rather... unusual way of distributing its seeds and scaring off predators: Its flower contains a capsule of explosive gas that pops, when disturbed.\
\
If I am not careful around this flower, for example if I tough it too roughly, I risk turning my surroundings into a fiery crater.
book.spectrum.guidebook.doomblooms.page1:
When fully grown, I can harvest [#](bb00bb)Gunpowder[#]() from it.\
\
Breaking it without blowing it up requires [#](bb00bb)Silk Touch[#]() or [#](bb00bb)Shears[#]().
In the deepest parts of the Deeper Down, I found this new type of stone.\
Immensely hard, even [#](bb00bb)Bedrock[#]() is a joke compared to it.
book.spectrum.guidebook.downstone_fragme:
Looks like whoever came before me was able to harvest Downstone! But only with the help of [colossal, imposing drills](entry://dimension/excavation_sites).\
\
It seems like they used it to manufacture [#](bb00bb)Preservation Stone[#]()?
book.spectrum.guidebook.knotted_sword.pa:
A living sword! Just as lively to use!.\
Playing around with [Nightdew](entry://general/nightdew_sprout) and some of that [Vegetal](entry://general/vegetal) stuff I created, I managed to create this [#](bb00bb)light greatsword[#](). I can use it to block attacks and even strengthen my counterattack if I shield right before I am hit.\
If I am airborne when I stop blocking, I can even lunge forward with it!

Getting hit by this mid-lunge would probably hurt a lot - especially since the force would probably be enough to make the blade shed some poison stuff.\
\
*Not that kind of knot.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.nectar_lance.pag:
Long did I stare into the pages of Manxi's journal, and at the endlessness of those vestiges I cannot find the words to describe.\
This was the result. A new [#](bb00bb)Light greatsword[#](), one that is sharper, better honed, better balanced; its lunges go farther and strike truer, and its guard is more reliable.\
\
Piercing someone with its lunge will consume their status effects.

DoT effects will deal a chunk of the damage they would have dealt; if there are none, then those afflicted with sleep will always be crit. If neither of those can happen, then it will steal positive effects.\
\
*This one does not have a knot...*
book.spectrum.guidebook.draconic_twinswo:
What my musings have created here is nothing short of a masterpiece of versatility.\
This double-headed sword is exquisitely balanced, allowing for wide and powerful sweeping attacks. The delicate [Bloodstone](entry://creating_life/bloodstone) construction of the weapon makes it delightfully stalwart, and excellent at keeping an edge.\
\
An unwelcoming, yet entrancing weapon.

The [#](f0af15)Yellow Ink[#]() coursing through the sword allows me to throw it at extreme speed by hitting it after throwing it upwards. I catch it with a right-click - just have to watch out for the rebound.\
\
*I should try not to kill myself with it.*

The dynamism of this weapon goes on much further. If I switch hands while holding it while my other hand is empty, I can split the sword in two, resulting in a pair of twin daggers. Swift and deadly, these can also be thrown, though they work a little differently. Those same wisps of fluttering dandelion allow for nefarious mobility.

I can recall the daggers at will after throwing them - flinging me forward, or alternatively throwing the mobs they hit towards me. There are a lot of things that affect how and who moves, so I better play around with it a bit.

As a footnote, the weapon has some unique enchantment interactions.
- [Inertia](entry://enchanting/enchantments/inertia) boosts the Twinsword's strength each time it rebounds, while the talon's yoink on entities becomes stronger
- [Improved Critical](entry://enchanting/enchantments/improved_critical) improves hits against airborne targets
- Channeling improves sweeping and trades single-target ranged damage for AoE.
- Piercing does exactly what I would expect
book.spectrum.guidebook.nectar_gloves.pa:
A strange find in an even stranger place. These aubergine gloves are crafted of fine leather and are adorned with a peculiar white crystal.\
\
Putting them on seems to ward me with dike, and more than that, they cleanse me of negative status effects.

*These leave me wondering so many things.\
To bear dike while being devoid of [#](2432ff)Azurite[#]()... how?*
book.spectrum.guidebook.azuresque_dike_c:
My magnum opus of [#](2c2e8e)Azure Dike[#]()! The machinations of the preservation structures have puzzled me for so long, but I have finally made progress in replicating them!\
\
 Through the use of that... thing... I have managed to create a circuit that greatly empowers dike, speeding up its recovery and doubling any source of it.\
It is, however, unable to produce a shield on its own.

*A giant step for me!...\
\
...But a tiny one towards replicating the structures. The vestiges are far too faint, and the amount of azurite and downstone required would be unattainable.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.page0:
Is it really dragons these giant remnants come from?\
I don't know, honestly. But judging by their size, they could very well be!\
\
Even now, these blocks are surrounded by a magical aura, protecting them from blatant mining attempts. I had a *blast* just running my fingers over their rough surface.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.page1:
Damaging Dragonbone using [#](449900)Explosions[#]() seems to blow away the magical aura protecting them, finally making the blocks mineable.\
The dropped pieces still retain some of that ancient magic.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.page2: The [Cinderhearth](entry://ink/cinderhearth) is the only thing that generates enough heat to turn these bones to ash.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.page6: Most blocks can be returned to their polished form via the [Cinderhearth](entry://ink/cinderhearth).
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.anvil: While the bones are pretty sturdy, enough force is still able to pulverize them, making for an exceptional fertilizer.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonbone.drago: This pairing is ironic, in a way. What seems morbid, like breading chicken with egg, ends up as a dragon - dragon = ...nothing. It's just... ash.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonjags.name: Dragonjags
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonjags.page0: These undemanding plants can grow almost anywhere, even on plain rock.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dragonjags.page1: [#](bb00bb)Bone meal[#]() makes them grow and spread.
It looks red-hot, like liquid fire. While it burns like hell when touched (I *had* to satisfy my curiosity...), it gives off no heat at all.\
\
While [Midnight Solution](entry://general/midnight_solution) appears to be destructive for the sake of change, the intent of Dragonrot seems to me to be pure and total destruction only.
Throwing in some items in seems to corrupt them to the point where they turn into something else entirely.
Lakes of [Dragonrot](entry://dimension/dragonrot) permeate the flooded aerie here.\
A red liquor weeps from the walls; it is not water.

The first thing that struck me setting foot in this place was not the sinking soil, nor the wicked flora that broods within. It was the air. As soon as I took a breath, a searing pain lashed at my throat, slicing down to my lungs.\
\
*The air is thick with malice, a rotten haze that will poison me to death if I do not immunize myself to it.*
These small plants spread over the ground like ivy. They grow in small clusters in a tuft of snapping green. When I fertilize them, they spread even further.
It's not dirt, it's not mud, it's... something - I don't know what. In any case, I sink in a little when I step on it.
book.spectrum.guidebook.dreamflayer.page:
A truly exceptional weapon, it embodies the definition of "offense is the best defense."\
It is in the nature of the Dreamflayer to balance forces:\
The more armored my opponent is compared to me, the more damage it will deal.[#]()\
\
When empowered via Sneak-Use, it is able to slice through the strongest armor while consuming [#](8f2121)Red Ink[#]() at an alarming rate.

Requires a full moon night.\
\
*If I ever needed a reason to go on a rampage lightly clad, here it is.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.effect_prolongin: When I get other status effects, while this is active, they last longer.
Instead, when I get a level of Effect Prolonging, additional levels are stacked on top of existing levels, increasing the potency of the effect rather than resetting it's duration.
book.spectrum.guidebook.effulgent_deco.p:
I truly envy my [Kindlings](entry://creating_life/kindlings), spending their days covered in these fluffy, puffy feathers. Beyond soft - luxurious in both feel and color, even with the [#](f0af15)golden vibrancy[#]() flowing through them.\
\
I can see myself falling asleep on a cushion made from these.
book.spectrum.guidebook.effulgent_feathe:
The rather effulgent feathers of the [Kindlings](entry://creating_life/kindlings) are quite remarkable, so much so that I'm forced to give the little bumpkins coat trimmings on a regular basis.\
However, I've noticed that the feathers are often accompanied by drops of blood.\
*Can I let that [crystallize somehow](entry://general/liquid_crystal)*?
Dipped in [Liquid Crystal](entry://general/liquid_crystal), the feathers leave a glittering, crystalline residue.
book.spectrum.guidebook.egg_laying_wooly: We were at Frankenstein, correct? I have a *crazy* idea... but aren't those always the best?
What would my new creation like to eat? It's relevant, for... [reasons](entry://creating_life/memories).
What a wondrous creature. Able to be [#](449900)sheared[#]() and [#](449900)milked[#](), while also [#](449900)laying eggs[#]().
book.spectrum.guidebook.enchanted_food.p: Almost as tough as my life.
Of course the effect is considerably weaker than that of [#](bb00bb)Enchanted Golden Apples[#](), but they still make a handy crunchy snack for medium sized trips.
book.spectrum.guidebook.enchanter.name: The Enchanter
In my search for the perfect tool, I've found that the [#](bb00bb)Enchanting Table[#]() often doesn't do my bidding. This highly modified Enchanting Table should resolve most of the issues I had with the original one.[#]()\
\
It allows me to:
- [create new Enchanted Books](entry://enchanting/creating_enchanted_books)
- [upgrade them](entry://enchanting/upgrading_enchanted_books)
- [enchant items without consuming Enchanted Books](entry://enchanting/enchanting_items)
The Enchanter needs a focus structure to work.
Dimensions: 11x11x5 blocks\
Can be enhanced by placing [Upgrades](entry://magical_blocks/upgrades) on the four Gemstone Blocks.
- 1 Enchanter
- 8 Item Bowls
- 4+ Liquid Crystal Buckets
- 4 Polished Gemstone Blocks
- 8 Gemstone Lights
- 12 Polished Pillars
- 24 Polished Slabs
- 159 Polished Blocks

\
*Enhance the Enchanter with Upgrades by placing them on the Gemstone Blocks.*
book.spectrum.guidebook.enchanting_items:
Using the Enchanter to enchant items is fairly simple:\
I need to place [](item://minecraft:enchanted_book) in the [Item Bowls](entry://decoration/item_bowl) and the item I want to enchant on the Enchanter itself.\
\
Unlike normal enchanting, this will not consume my books - but will require a much greater amount of experience in exchange.
I can provide a steady stream of experience via [Knowledge Gem](entry://enchanting/knowledge_gem).

To create new [](item://minecraft:enchanted_book) I need to place the [](item://minecraft:enchanted_book) I want to copy in the [Item Bowls](entry://decoration/item_bowl) and a [common book](item://minecraft:book) on the [Enchanter](entry://enchanting/enchanter).\
\
Because of the mundane nature of the books this will require a lot of experience, though.

In most cases I estimate the cost to be **between 50 and 200 experience per enchantment**.\
Other factors affect this, too: how rare the enchantment is, its level and how well the target item can absorb enchantments.\
Interferences, such as enchantments that do not fit my target, will add to this cost.
book.spectrum.guidebook.enchantment_canv:
My pickaxe, which was sinfully expensive to enchant? It's almost broken, and each broken block now is more damaging to my nerves than the tool itself.\
\
Even if I can't save the tool, at least I can save the enchantments! This canvas does not capture color: when used on a tool, the enchantments are swapped.
